notes:
üì¢ Major Update: Cinematic Cut-ins v1.2.0

üé® Custom Assets & Freedom
- Unlimited Creativity: Upload your own Images or Videos (WebM/MP4) to Background and Overlay layers.
- Video Avatars: Full support for video files as character portraits.
- Custom Duration: Take full control over how long animations stay on screen.

ü§ù Interaction & Collaboration
- Interaction Prompts: GMs can now send 'Ready' cues to specific players for perfectly timed manual triggers.
- Skip Function: Players can now skip animations with a single click if the action gets too crowded.

‚ú® New Stylish Themes
- Arcane (Group): A mystical magic-circle theme for party finishers.
- Blossom & Slash: Added elegant floral and sharp diagonal personal styles.

‚öôÔ∏è Improvements & Fixes
- Resource triggers now support absolute numbers (e.g., HP < 10) along with percentages.
- Fixed timing desync in Scope theme and Arcane circle effects.
- Fixed Korean (KO) localization display issues in certain UI elements.

announcement.title: üé¨ v1.2.0 Major Update is Here!
announcement.content: Custom Assets, Interaction Prompts, and New Themes have been added. Design your own cinematic moments and collaborate with your players! Check the patch notes for details.
